﻿"POETICALL MUSICKE" ENGLISCHE MUSIK UM 1600 FUER VIOLS UND BROKEN CONSORT MITWIRKENDE Jordi Savall Christophe Coin Carol Lewis Roberto Gini Paolo Pandolfo Hopkinson Smith Robert Clancy Diskant-, Tenor-, Bassgambe und Lyra-Viol Alt-, Tenor-, Bassgambe und Lyra-Viol Tenorgambe Bassgambe Bassgambe und Consort-Bass Laute Laute HINWEIS 8. März 1983 20.15 Uhr Predigerkirche Jan Dismas Zelenka : Lamentationes Jeremiae Rene Jacobs, Kurt Widmer, Walter Meier Instrumentalisten der Schola Cantorum Basiliensis 17./18. März 1983 20.15 Uhr St. Alban-Kirche Minnesang und Trouväres Ensemble Sequentia
William Byrd 1543-1623 Tobias Hume ca.1570-ca.1645 John Dowland 1562-1626 FANTASIES AND GROUNDS Fantasia ä 5 Prelude and Ground ä 5 Browning ä 5 POETICALL MUSICKE . 1607 Start : The Lady of Sussex delight A Masque : The Earle of Sussex delight A Mery Conceit : The Queens delight An Alm=iine : The Lady Canes delight Sweet Ayre : The Earle of Arundel 's favoret The Earle of Pembrookes Galliard PAUSE The Spirite of Musicke A Jigge for Ladies Sweet Musicke : The Earle of Salisburies favoret A Spanish humor : The Lord Hayes favoret The King of Denmarkes delight A French Alma ine : The Duke of Lenox delight The Pashion of Musicke : Sir Christopher Hattons choice PAVANS, GALLIARDS AND ALMANDS . 1605 Semper Dowland semper dolens The King of Denmark's Galliards Sir Henrry Unton 's Funeral The Earle of Essex's Galliard Mr. George Whitehead's Almain
